alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 8:18PM CDT until August 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Cheyenne, Hammon, Strong City, Moorewood, Roll, Foss Reservoir, Berlin, and Dempsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
